text: Half Nelson is an American detective comedy-drama series that aired on NBC from March 24 until May 10, 1985."Half Nelson" Television Obscurities. Retrieved 2017-01-12. ==Premise== Rocky Nelson is a former New York City cop who moved to Beverly Hills, where he got a job at a private security service for the rich and famous, while attempting to make it as an actor. In addition to guarding celebrities, he also helps solve crimes. ==Cast== *Joe Pesci as Rocky Nelson *Fred Williamson as Chester Long *Victoria Jackson as Annie O'Hara *Bubba Smith as Kurt *Dick Butkus as Beau *Gary Grubbs as Det.
